description: Try our easy to follow Choc Banana Yoghurt recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pudding,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Egg free,Chocolate,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Peanut free
name: Choc Banana Yoghurt Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place banana, yoghurt and chocolate hazelnut spread in a blender or food processor. Pulse 2-3 times, then process on high speed for 15-20 seconds until smooth and creamy.
Line a 5-cup loaf pan with baking paper, leaving sides to overhang so itâ€™s easier to lift out when frozen. Transfer mix to pan and freeze overnight until firm.
Remove from pan using the paper. Cut into slices and top with toasted coconut.
